text: Daniela Galli (), also known as Dhany (born 23 October 1972), is an Italian singer-songwriter. She is most known for her work with Benassi Bros. music project. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Quiero Respirar (2000) * E-Motions (2007) === Singles === ====As lead artist==== *1998 — "Dha Dha Tune" *1999 — "Quiero Respirar" *2000 — "Shut Up" *2006 — "Miles of Love" *2007 — "Let It Go" *2008 — "U & I" ====As featured artist==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Single ! colspan="7"| Peak chart positions ! rowspan="2"| Album |- style="font- size:smaller;" ! width="35"| FIN Finnish peak ! width="35"| FRA French peaks ! width="35"| GER German peak ! width="35"| ITA ! width="35"| NED Dutch peak ! width="35"| SUI Swiss peaks ! width="35"| UK |- | 1995 | align="left"| "Somebody to Touch Me" (KMC featuring Dhany) | — | — | — | — | — | — | — | align="left" rowspan="3"| Singles only |- | 1996 | align="left"| "Street Life" (KMC featuring Dhany) | — | — | — | — | — | — | — |- | rowspan=2| 2000 | align="left"| "I Wanna Be Free" (vs. Mumm) | — | — | — | 46 | — | — | — |- | align="left"| "I Need Your Love" (with Tech-Nique) | — | — | — | — | — | — | — |- | 2001 | align="left"| "I Feel So Fine" (KMC featuring Dhany) | — | — | — | — | — | — | 33 |- | 2002 | align="left"| "Run to Me" (with AL.BEN) | — | — | — | — | — | — | — |- | 2004 | align="left"| "Hit My Heart" (Benassi Bros. featuring Dhany) | — | 11 | — | 50 | 34 | 48 | — |- | rowspan=3| 2005 | align="left"| "Make Me Feel" (Benassi Bros. featuring Dhany) | — | 21 | 96 | — | — | 80 | — |- | align="left"| "Every Single Day" (Benassi Bros. featuring Dhany) | 9 | 23 | — | — | — | 97 | — |- | align="left"| "Rocket in the Sky" (Benassi Bros. featuring Dhany) | — | 48 | — | — | — | — | — |- | colspan="15" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes releases that did not chart |- |} ==Notes== ==External links== ;Official websites and public pages * dhany.it — Dhany official website.
